metadata.description: A globally unique name for the Function App to be created which will run the code to ingest DLP data into Sentinel.

Select to enable Application Insights for the Function App. This will allow you to monitor the status of the Function App for any errors. The Log Analytics Workspace specified in the "Log Analytics Resource Id" Parameter will be used to store the Application Insights data.
A globally unique name for the Key Vault to be created which will store Function App secrets.
A globally unique name for the Function App Storage Account. Must be between 3 and 24 characters in length and use numbers and lower-case letters only.
Azure AD tenant ID in which DLP instance resides.
App Registration Client ID.
App Registration Client secret.
Internal domain names for your organization to better determine the source of email messages.
Name for Data Collection Endpoint to be created which is used to ingest data into Log Analytics workspace.
Name for Data Collection Rule to be created which is used to ingest data into Log Analytics workspace.

Azure Resource ID of the existing Log Analytics Workspace where you would like the DLP and optional Function App Application Insights data to reside. The format is: "/subscriptions/xxxxxxxx-xxxxxxxx-xxxxxxxx-xxxxxxxx-xxxxxxxx/resourcegroups/xxxxxxxx/providers/microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces/xxxxxxxx"
Azure location/region of the Log Analytics Workspace referenced in the LogAnalyticsWorkspaceResourceID parameter.

Create a Sentinel scheduled query rule for each DLP policy and workload (i.e., Teams, SharePoint, Endpoint, etc.). If "false", a single scheduled query rule will be created to cover all policies and workloads.
Deploy Azure workbooks to help visualize the DLP data and manage DLP incidents.

properties.query:
let alertProductName = 'Microsoft Data Loss Prevention (Custom)';
let endpointSeverityMatchCountTrigger = 2;

let DLPCommon = PurviewDLP_CL
| join kind=leftanti (SecurityAlert
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(12h)
    | where ProductName == alertProductName
    | extend Identifier = substring(AlertLink, indexof(AlertLink, 'eventid=') + 8, indexof(AlertLink, '&creationtime') - indexof(AlertLink, 'eventid=') - 8)
    ) on Identifier
| mv-expand PolicyDetails
| where PolicyDetails.PolicyName != ''
| mv-expand Rules = PolicyDetails.Rules
| mv-expand ActionsTaken = Rules.Actions
| mv-expand SensitiveInfo = Rules.ConditionsMatched.SensitiveInformation
| extend RulesString = tostring(Rules), SensitiveInfoString = tostring(SensitiveInfo)
| summarize ActionsTaken = make_set(ActionsTaken), arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by TimeGenerated, CreationTime, Identifier, RulesString, SensitiveInfoString
| extend SensitiveInfoType = bag_pack('Name', SensitiveInfo.SensitiveInformationTypeName, 'Count', toint(SensitiveInfo.Count), 'Confidence', toint(SensitiveInfo.Confidence))
| extend
    ActionsTaken = strcat_array(ActionsTaken, ', '),
    SensitiveInfoTypeString = strcat(SensitiveInfoType.Name, ' (', SensitiveInfoType.Count, ', ', SensitiveInfoType.Confidence, '%)'),
    Product = alertProductName,
    PolicyName = tostring(PolicyDetails.PolicyName),
    RuleName = tostring(Rules.RuleName),
    RuleSeverity = tostring(Rules.Severity),
    UserPrincipalName = tolower(UserId),
    UserObjectId = UserKey,
    Deeplink = strcat('https://compliance.microsoft.com/datalossprevention/alerts/eventdeeplink?eventid=', Identifier, '&creationtime=', CreationTime)
| order by TimeGenerated asc
| take 150;

let DLPSPOD = DLPCommon
| where Workload in ('SharePoint', 'OneDrive')
| mv-expand SensitivityLablelId = SharePointMetaData.SensitivityLablelIds
| extend SensitivityLabelId = tostring(SharePointMetaData.SensitivityLablelId)
| join kind = leftouter (_GetWatchlist('SensitivityLabels')
    | extend SensitivityLabelId = tostring(column_ifexists('id', '')),
        SensitivityLabelName = tostring(column_ifexists('name', ''))) on SensitivityLabelId
| extend OfficeObjectId = url_decode(tostring(SharePointMetaData.FilePathUrl))
| extend CreationTimeBin = bin(CreationTime, 1m)
| join kind = leftouter (OfficeActivity
    | where ingestion_time() > ago(24h)
    | where Operation == "AddedToSecureLink" or Operation == "SecureLinkUsed"
    | extend CreationTimeBin = bin(TimeGenerated, 1m),
        TargetUserOrGroupName = tolower(iff(isempty(TargetUserOrGroupName), split(UserId, "#")[1], TargetUserOrGroupName))
    ) on OfficeObjectId, CreationTimeBin
| extend Filename = tostring(SharePointMetaData.FileName),
    FilePath = tostring(SharePointMetaData.FilePathUrl),
    SiteUrl = tostring(SharePointMetaData.SiteCollectionUrl),
    ExceptionReason = tostring(SharePointMetaData.ExceptionInfo.Reason)
| summarize SensitiveInfoTypesArray = make_list(SensitiveInfoType), SensitiveInfoTypes = make_set(SensitiveInfoTypeString), TotalMatchCount = sum(toint(SensitiveInfoType.Count)), SensitivityLabels = make_list(SensitivityLabelName) by TimeGenerated, CreationTime, Identifier, Product, Workload, Deeplink, usageLocation, UserPrincipalName, UserObjectId, department, manager, jobTitle, PolicyName, RuleName, RuleSeverity, ActionsTaken, FilePath, Filename, SiteUrl, TargetUserOrGroupName, ExceptionReason, Operation;

let DLPEXOT = DLPCommon
| where Workload in ('Exchange', 'MicrosoftTeams')
| extend Recipients = iff(Workload == 'Exchange', tostring(strcat(array_strcat(ExchangeMetaData.To, ', '), iff(array_length(ExchangeMetaData.CC) == 0, '', ", "), array_strcat(ExchangeMetaData.CC, ', '), iff(array_length(ExchangeMetaData.BCC) == 0, '', ", "))), tostring(strcat_array(ExchangeMetaData.To, ', '))),
    InternetMessageId = replace_string(replace_string(tostring(ExchangeMetaData.MessageID), '<', ''), '>',''),
    EmailSubject = tostring(ExchangeMetaData.Subject),
    Sender = UserPrincipalName,
    ExceptionReason = tostring(ExchangeMetaData.ExceptionInfo.Reason)
| summarize SensitiveInfoTypesArray = make_list(SensitiveInfoType), SensitiveInfoTypes = make_set(SensitiveInfoTypeString), TotalMatchCount = sum(toint(SensitiveInfoType.Count)), DetectedLocations = make_set(SensitiveInfo.Location) by TimeGenerated, CreationTime, Identifier, Product, Workload, Deeplink, usageLocation, UserPrincipalName, UserObjectId, department, manager, jobTitle, PolicyName, RuleName, RuleSeverity, ActionsTaken, Recipients, InternetMessageId, EmailSubject, Sender, ExceptionReason, Operation;

let EndpointAction = datatable(ActionName: string, ActionId: int) [
    "None", "0",
    "Audit", "1",
    "Warn", "2",
    "WarnAndBypass", "3",
    "Block", "4",
    "Allow", "5"
];

let DLPEndpoint = DLPCommon
| where Workload in ('Endpoint')
| mv-expand SensitiveInfo = EndpointMetaData.SensitiveInfoTypeData
| extend SensitiveInfoType = bag_pack('Name', SensitiveInfo.SensitiveInfoTypeName, 'Count', toint(SensitiveInfo.Count), 'Confidence', toint(SensitiveInfo.Confidence)),
    DeviceFullName = tostring(EndpointMetaData.DeviceName)
| extend SensitiveInfoTypeString = strcat(SensitiveInfoType.Name, ' (', SensitiveInfoType.Count, ', ', SensitiveInfoType.Confidence, '%)'),
    ActionId = toint(EndpointMetaData.EnforcementMode),
    ClientIP = tostring(EndpointMetaData.ClientIP),
    DeviceHostName = tostring(split(DeviceFullName, '.')[0]), 
    DeviceDNSName = tostring(substring(DeviceFullName, indexof(DeviceFullName, '.')+1)),
    Filename = DocumentName,
    FilePath = ObjectId,
    FileHash = tostring(EndpointMetaData.Sha256),
    FileHashAlgorithm = 'SHA256',
    RMSEncrypted = tostring(EndpointMetaData.RMSEncrypted),
    EvidenceFileUrl = tostring(EvidenceFile.FullUrl),
    SourceLocationType = tostring(EndpointMetaData.SourceLocationType), 
    EndpointOperation = tostring(EndpointMetaData.EndpointOperation),
    EndpointApplication = tostring(EndpointMetaData.Application)   
| join kind = inner(EndpointAction) on ActionId
| extend ActionsTaken = ActionName
| summarize SensitiveInfoTypesArray = make_list(SensitiveInfoType), SensitiveInfoTypes = make_list(SensitiveInfoTypeString), TotalMatchCount = sum(toint(SensitiveInfo.Count)) by TimeGenerated, CreationTime, Identifier, Product, Workload, Deeplink, usageLocation, UserPrincipalName, UserObjectId, department, manager, jobTitle, PolicyName, RuleName, ActionsTaken, DeviceFullName, DeviceHostName, DeviceDNSName, Filename, FilePath, FileHash, FileHashAlgorithm, RMSEncrypted, EvidenceFileUrl, SourceLocationType, EndpointOperation, EndpointApplication, Operation;

union DLPSPOD, DLPEXOT, DLPEndpoint
| extend FileDirectory = parse_path(FilePath).DirectoryPath
| project TimeGenerated, CreationTime, Identifier, Product, Workload, Deeplink, usageLocation, UserPrincipalName, UserObjectId, department, manager, jobTitle, PolicyName, RuleName, ActionsTaken, SensitiveInfoTypesArray, TotalMatchCount, DeviceFullName, DeviceHostName, DeviceDNSName, Filename, FilePath, FileDirectory, FileHash, FileHashAlgorithm, RMSEncrypted, EvidenceFileUrl, SourceLocationType, EndpointOperation, EndpointApplication, Recipients, InternetMessageId, EmailSubject, Sender, ExceptionReason, SiteUrl, TargetUserOrGroupName, Operation,
    Username = split(UserPrincipalName, '@')[0], UPNSuffix =split(UserPrincipalName, '@')[1], 
    RuleSeverity = iff(TotalMatchCount >= endpointSeverityMatchCountTrigger and Workload == 'Endpoint', 'High', RuleSeverity), 
    SensitiveInfoTypes = iff(array_length(SensitiveInfoTypes) > 1, strcat(SensitiveInfoTypes[0], ' +', array_length(SensitiveInfoTypes) - 1, ' more'), strcat_array(SensitiveInfoTypes, ', ')), 
    DetectedLocations = strcat_array(DetectedLocations, ', '), SensitivityLabels = strcat_array(SensitivityLabels, ', ')
| order by TimeGenerated

alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat: Microsoft Purview DLP ({{Workload}}) alert for {{UserPrincipalName}}. Use the alert link to view more details about the events within the alert.

properties.query:
let policywatchlist =(_GetWatchlist('Policy')
    | project SearchKey);

let EndPointAction = datatable(ActionName: string, Action: int) [
    "None", "0",
    "Audit", "1",
    "Warn", "2",
    "WarnAndBypass", "3",
    "Block", "4",
    "Allow", "5"
];

PurviewDLP_CL
| extend RuleName = tostring(PolicyDetails[0].Rules[0].RuleName)
| extend Policy = tostring(PolicyDetails[0].PolicyName)
| extend PolicyId = tostring(PolicyDetails[0].PolicyId)
| where Policy != "" //Do Not Remove
| where not(Policy has_any (policywatchlist)) //Do not remove
| extend RuleId = tostring(PolicyDetails[0].Rules[0].RuleId)
| extend SensitiveInfoTypeName1 = tostring(EndpointMetaData.SensitiveInfoTypeData[0].SensitiveInfoTypeName)      
| extend Detected1 = tostring(EndpointMetaData.SensitiveInfoTypeData[0].SensitiveInformationDetectionsInfo.DetectedValues)
| extend Detected = array_slice(todynamic(Detected1), 0, 5)
| extend Deeplink = strcat("https://compliance.microsoft.com/datalossprevention/alerts/eventdeeplink?eventid=", Identifier, "&creationtime=", CreationTime)
| extend Action = toint(EndpointMetaData.EnforcementMode)
| extend accountsplit = split(UserId, "@")
| mv-expand EndpointMetaData.SensitiveInfoTypeData
| summarize
    MatchCount = sum(toint(EndpointMetaData_SensitiveInfoTypeData.Count)),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated, *)
    by Identifier
| extend Provider = "Microsoft Purview Sentinel Solution"
| extend Product = "Microsoft Data Loss Prevention (Advanced)"
| join kind= inner
    (
    EndPointAction
    )
    on Action
| project PolicyId, SensitiveInfoTypeName1, UserKey, DocumentName, ObjectId, EndpointMetaData.ClientIP, EndpointMetaData.RMSEncrypted, EndpointMetaData.EnforcementMode, EndpointMetaData.DeviceName, EndpointMetaData.SourceLocationType, Policy, RuleName, usageLocation, EndpointMetaData.EndpointOperation, EndpointMetaData.Sha256, department, manager, ActionName, Detected,    Workload, jobTitle, Deeplink, UserId, accountsplit[0], accountsplit[1], EvidenceFile.FullUrl, MatchCount, Identifier, Provider, Product

let policywatchlist =(_GetWatchlist('Policy')
    | project SearchKey);

PurviewDLP_CL
| where Workload !in ('SharePoint', 'Endpoint', 'OneDrive')
| extend Policy = tostring(PolicyDetails[0].PolicyName)
| where Policy != "" //Do Not Remove
| where not(Policy has_any (policywatchlist)) //Do not remove
| extend Detected1 = tostring(PolicyDetails[0].Rules[0].ConditionsMatched.SensitiveInformation[0].SensitiveInformationDetections.DetectedValues)
| extend Detected = array_slice(todynamic(Detected1), 0, 5)
| extend SensitiveInformationTypeName = tostring(PolicyDetails[0].Rules[0].ConditionsMatched.SensitiveInformation[0].SensitiveInformationTypeName)
| extend MessageId = ObjectId
| extend linkoriginal = originalContent
| extend Actions = tostring(PolicyDetails[0].Rules[0].Actions)       
| extend linkoriginal = tostring(iff(isempty(SharePointMetaData.FilePathUrl), originalContent, SharePointMetaData.FilePathUrl))
| extend Account = tostring(iff(isempty(SharePointMetaData.From), ExchangeMetaData.From, SharePointMetaData.From))
| extend SubjectDoc = tostring(iff(isempty(SharePointMetaData.FileName), ExchangeMetaData.Subject, SharePointMetaData.FileName))
| extend Recipients = tostring(strcat("To:", ExchangeMetaData.To, " CC:", ExchangeMetaData.CC, " BCC:", ExchangeMetaData.BCC))
| extend MatchConfidence = tostring(PolicyDetails[0].Rules[0].ConditionsMatched.SensitiveInformation[0].Confidence)
| extend UserId = tostring(ExchangeMetaData.From)
| extend accountsplit = split(UserId, "@")
| extend SensitiveLabelIdnew = tostring(SharePointMetaData.SensitivityLabelIds[0])
| extend RuleName = tostring(PolicyDetails[0].Rules[0].RuleName)
| extend SITLocation = tostring(PolicyDetails[0].Rules[0].ConditionsMatched.SensitiveInformation[0].Location)
| extend OtherMatch = tostring(PolicyDetails[0].Rules[0].ConditionsMatched.OtherConditions[0])
| extend severity = tostring(PolicyDetails[0].Rules[0].Severity)
| extend Deeplink = strcat("https://compliance.microsoft.com/datalossprevention/alerts/eventdeeplink?eventid=", Identifier, "&creationtime=", CreationTime)
| extend Provider = "Microsoft Purview Sentinel Solution"
| extend Product = "Microsoft Data Loss Prevention (Advanced)"
| mv-expand PolicyDetails
| mv-expand PolicyDetails.Rules
| mv-expand PolicyDetails_Rules.ConditionsMatched.SensitiveInformation
| summarize
    MatchCount = sum(toint(PolicyDetails_Rules_ConditionsMatched_SensitiveInformation.Count)),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated, *)
    by Identifier
| project Account, Workload, SensitiveInformationTypeName, Detected, linkoriginal, Recipients, SubjectDoc, TimeGenerated, manager, department, Actions, Policy, MatchConfidence, MatchCount,    MessageID=ExchangeMetaData.MessageID, accountsplit[0], accountsplit[1], UserId, Identifier, ExceptionReason = ExchangeMetaData.ExceptionInfo.Reason, RuleName, usageLocation, SITLocation, OtherMatch, severity, jobTitle, tostring(ExceptionInfo.Justification), Detected1, Deeplink, Provider, Product

let policywatchlist =(_GetWatchlist('Policy')
    | project SearchKey);

let domains=(_GetWatchlist('domains')
    | project SearchKey);

let DLP = (PurviewDLP_CL
    | extend path = parse_path(tostring(SharePointMetaData.FilePathUrl))
    | extend DirectoryPath = tostring(path.DirectoryPath)
    | summarize by DirectoryPath);
let officedata = (
    OfficeActivity
    | where ingestion_time() > ago(24h)
    | where Operation == "AddedToSecureLink" or Operation == "SecureLinkUsed"
    | where OfficeObjectId has_any (DLP)
    | extend SiteCollectionUrl = Site_Url
    | extend FileName = SourceFileName
    | extend Account = tolower(UserId)
    | extend Targetsplit = split(UserId, "#")
    | extend TargetUserOrGroupName = iff(isempty(TargetUserOrGroupName), Targetsplit[1], TargetUserOrGroupName)
    //Exclude internal domains
    //| where TargetUserOrGroupName !has "mydom1.com"
    | extend TargetUserOrGroupName = tolower(TargetUserOrGroupName)
    | summarize
        by FileName, SiteCollectionUrl, TargetUserOrGroupName, OfficeObjectId, Account);

let dlpmain = (
    PurviewDLP_CL
    | where Workload in ('SharePoint', 'OneDrive')
    | extend Policy = tostring(PolicyDetails[0].PolicyName)
    | where Policy != "" //Do Not Remove
    | where not(Policy has_any (policywatchlist)) //Do not remove
    | extend Detected1 = tostring(PolicyDetails[0].Rules[0].ConditionsMatched.SensitiveInformation[0].SensitiveInformationDetections.DetectedValues)
    | extend Detected = array_slice(todynamic(Detected1), 0, 5)
    | extend SensitiveInformationTypeName = tostring(PolicyDetails[0].Rules[0].ConditionsMatched.SensitiveInformation[0].SensitiveInformationTypeName)
    | extend MessageId = ObjectId
    | extend linkoriginal = originalContent
    | extend Actions = tostring(PolicyDetails[0].Rules[0].Actions)   
    | extend FilePathUrl = url_decode(tostring(SharePointMetaData.FilePathUrl))
    | extend linkoriginal = iff(isempty(FilePathUrl), originalContent, FilePathUrl)
    | extend Account = iff(isempty(SharePointMetaData.From), ExchangeMetaData.From, tolower(SharePointMetaData.From))    
    | extend SubjectDoc = tostring(iff(isempty(SharePointMetaData.FileName), ExchangeMetaData.Subject, SharePointMetaData.FileName))
    | extend Recipients = strcat("To:", ExchangeMetaData.To, " CC:", ExchangeMetaData.CC, " BCC:", ExchangeMetaData.BCC) 
    | extend MatchConfidence = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(PolicyDetails[0].Rules))[0].ConditionsMatched)).SensitiveInformation))[0].Confidence)
    | extend accountsplit = split(UserId, "@")
    | extend SensitiveLabelIdnew = tostring(SharePointMetaData.SensitivityLabelIds[0])
    | extend path = parse_path(FilePathUrl)
    | extend OfficeObjectId = tostring(path.DirectoryPath)
    | join kind = leftouter
        (
        _GetWatchlist('SensitivityLabels')
        | extend SensitiveLabelIdnew = tostring(column_ifexists('id', ''))
        | extend Label = tostring(column_ifexists('name', ''))
        )
        on SensitiveLabelIdnew);

let folder = (dlpmain
    | join kind = leftouter
        (officedata
        | summarize
            by
            SiteCollectionUrl,
            FileName,
            TargetUserOrGroupName,
            OfficeObjectId
        | summarize TargetUserOrGroupName = make_list(strcat(TargetUserOrGroupName))
            by
            OfficeObjectId,
            SiteCollectionUrl,
            FileName
        | summarize take_any(TargetUserOrGroupName)
            by
            OfficeObjectId,
            SiteCollectionUrl,
            FileName
        | join kind = leftouter
            (
            officedata
            | summarize
                by
                SiteCollectionUrl,
                FileName,
                TargetUserOrGroupName,
                OfficeObjectId
            | extend Domsplit = split(TargetUserOrGroupName, "@")
            | extend domain = Domsplit[1]
            | summarize TargetDomain = make_list(strcat(domain)) by FileName, OfficeObjectId
            | summarize take_any(TargetDomain) by FileName, OfficeObjectId
            )
            on OfficeObjectId
        )
        on OfficeObjectId
    );

let files = (folder
    //| where TargetUserOrGroupName == ""
    | join kind = leftouter
        (officedata
        | summarize TargetUserOrGroupName = make_list(strcat(TargetUserOrGroupName)) by FileName, SiteCollectionUrl
        | summarize take_any(TargetUserOrGroupName) by FileName, SiteCollectionUrl   
        | join kind = leftouter
            (
            officedata
            | summarize
                by
                SiteCollectionUrl,
                FileName,
                TargetUserOrGroupName
            | extend Domsplit = split(TargetUserOrGroupName, "@")
            | extend domain = Domsplit[1]
            | summarize TargetDomain = make_list(strcat(domain)) by FileName
            | summarize take_any(TargetDomain) by FileName
            )
            on FileName
        )
        on FileName, SiteCollectionUrl
    | extend TargetUserOrGroupName = TargetUserOrGroupName1
    | extend TargetDomain = TargetDomain1
    | where TargetUserOrGroupName != ""
    );
    
union folder, files
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by SubjectDoc, UserId, Identifier
| join kind = leftouter
    (
    officedata
    | extend Domsplit = split(TargetUserOrGroupName, "@")
    | extend domain = Domsplit[1]
    | where tolower(domain) in (domains)
    | summarize TargetDomain = make_list(strcat(domain)) by tostring(SiteCollectionUrl)
    )
    on SiteCollectionUrl
| extend HighRiskDomain = iff(isempty(TargetDomain), "", "HighRiskDomain")
| extend Policy = strcat(tostring(PolicyDetails[0].PolicyName), " ", HighRiskDomain)
| extend RuleName = strcat(tostring(parse_json(tostring(PolicyDetails[0].Rules))[0].RuleName), " ", HighRiskDomain)
| extend SITLocation = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(PolicyDetails[0].Rules))[0].ConditionsMatched)).SensitiveInformation))[0].Location)
| extend OtherMatch = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(PolicyDetails[0].Rules))[0].ConditionsMatched)).OtherConditions))[0])
| extend severity = tostring(PolicyDetails[0].Rules[0].Severity)
| extend Deeplink = strcat("https://compliance.microsoft.com/datalossprevention/alerts/eventdeeplink?eventid=", Identifier, "&creationtime=", CreationTime)
| mv-expand PolicyDetails
| mv-expand PolicyDetails.Rules
| mv-expand PolicyDetails_Rules.ConditionsMatched.SensitiveInformation
| extend Provider = "Microsoft Purview Sentinel Solution"
| extend Product = "Microsoft Data Loss Prevention (Advanced)"
| summarize MatchCount = sum(toint(PolicyDetails_Rules_ConditionsMatched_SensitiveInformation.Count))
    by Account, Workload, SensitiveInformationTypeName, tostring(Detected), linkoriginal, Recipients, SubjectDoc, TimeGenerated, manager, department, Actions, Policy, MatchConfidence, tostring(ExchangeMetaData.MessageID), tostring(accountsplit[0]), tostring(accountsplit[1]), UserId, Identifier, Label, tostring(SharePointMetaData.ExceptionInfo.Reason), RuleName, SITLocation, OtherMatch,
    tostring(severity), jobTitle, tostring(ExceptionInfo.Justification), Deeplink, tostring(TargetUserOrGroupName), HighRiskDomain, usageLocation, Provider, Product
